igPCA.GMD

Sparse Generalized Matrix Decomposition

Module Contents

Classes

GMD

This class implements the Generalized Matrix Decomposition (GMD) and supports sparse loading and score given by lasso.
class igPCA.GMD.GMD(X, H, Q, K=3, max_iter=50, tol=0.0001, lu=0, lv=0)[source]

This class implements the Generalized Matrix Decomposition (GMD) and supports sparse loading and score given by lasso.

Parameters:

  • X ({array-like, sparse matrix of shape (int n, int p)}) --

  • H ({array-like, matrix} of shape (int n, int n)) -- Matrix Characterizing the (dis)similarity structure of sample space of X

  • Q ({array-like, matrix} of shape (int p, int p)) -- Matrix Characterizing the (dis)similarity structure of variable space of X

  • K (int, default=3) -- Number of components to keep

  • max_iter (int, default=50) -- The maximum number of iterations.

  • tol (float, default=1e-4) -- The tolerance for the optimization: if the updates are smaller than tol, the optimization code checks the dual gap for optimality and continues until it is smaller than tol

  • lu (float, default=None) -- Constant that multiplies the L1 term with respect to score(U), controlling regularization strength. lu must be a non-negative float i.e. in [0, inf).

  • lv (float, default=None) -- Constant that multiplies the L1 term with respect to loading(V), controlling regularization strength. lu must be a non-negative float i.e. in [0, inf).

X
Type:

{array-like, sparse matrix of shape (int n, int p)}

H

Matrix Characterizing the (dis)similarity structure of sample space of X

Type:

{array-like, matrix} of shape (int n, int n)

Q

Matrix Characterizing the (dis)similarity structure of variable space of X

Type:

{array-like, matrix} of shape (int p, int p)

K

Number of components to keep

Type:

int, default=3

max_iter

The maximum number of iterations.

Type:

int, default=50

tol

The tolerance for the optimization: if the updates are smaller than tol, the optimization code checks the dual gap for optimality and continues until it is smaller than tol

Type:

float, default=1e-4

lu

Constant that multiplies the L1 term with respect to score(U), controlling regularization strength. lu must be a non-negative float i.e. in [0, inf).

Type:

float, default=None

lv

Constant that multiplies the L1 term with respect to loading(V), controlling regularization strength. lu must be a non-negative float i.e. in [0, inf).

Type:

float, default=None

U

Estimated GMD score

Type:

{array-like, matrix} of shape (n, K)

D

Estimated GMD value

Type:

{array-like} of shape (K)

V

Estimated GMD loading

Type:

{array-like, matrix} of shape (p, K)

X_hat

Estimated GMD value, it is equivalent to the mean matrix of X when assuming X ~ MN_{n,p}(X_hat, H^{-1}, Q^{-1})

Type:

{array-like, matrix} of shape (n, K)
